ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(RW_Type_of_Client__c,'Outstation'),ISPICKVAL(RW_Type_of_Client__c,'NRI')) , ISBLANK(RW_Company_Location__c), TODAY() >= Date(2024,01,03),ISNEW(),$Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
